title: Students Served
desc: Under strict rules and limited time and resources, teams of high school students are challenged to build industrial-size robots to play a difficult field game.

title: Communities Served
desc: With sponsors from Google, Amazon, Facebook, and Boeing, all of our programs are free to everyone. All you have to do to sign up is apply!
